data.title: Great TeamBuilder idea!
data.text: We did the Epic Escape Game in Cheyenne as a team builder and had so much fun! Sarah and Jessika were great to work with and were a great help in getting our big group divided to make the experience enjoyable yet competitive. I highly recommend giving this a try as a team builder or even with a group of friends and family! I will most definitely be going back and try to escape all the games!

owner_response.author: Jessika_and_Sarah, Owner at Epic Escape Game Cheyenne, responded to this review
owner_response.text: Thank you very much for your rating! We're always delighted to hear how our customers feel about their experience! It was our pleasure to assist you and your team with your team building experience and are very happy to hear you enjoyed it! We look forward to having you back for our other rooms!
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Awesome Fun
data.text: So much fun...we escaped with 5 minutes on the clock but it was very challenging. We had a great time and can't say enough good about the owners....so friendly and welcoming. Thanks for another exciting experience.

owner_response.author: Jessika_and_Sarah, Owner at Epic Escape Game Cheyenne, responded to this review
owner_response.text: Thanks so much for coming back! We're very excited to hear that you've enjoyed both of your experiences with us! We appreciate you taking the time to write a review and give us a rating. Thank you!
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Great Experience
data.text: We have done escape rooms in Denver and were so pleased to find one closer to home. Great option for families with younger kids (6-12), or for your first time, as there are some easier games to choose from that have a higher escape rate. The owners were great and are committed to their customers having a good time. We will be back!

owner_response.author: Jessika_and_Sarah, Owner at Epic Escape Game Cheyenne, responded to this review
owner_response.text: Thank you for your review, it's always wonderful to hear how we stack up against other escape rooms! We're excited that you'll be back and happy to hear that your entire group enjoyed the experience!
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Great fun for families and friends - so good to have a new option for entertainment!
data.text: If you've done escape rooms elsewhere, you'll find the Cheyenne games on par with the best (I've done a few in CA). If you haven't, you're in for a treat! We did the "Clued In" room (a board game theme) and had a great time -- can't wait to go back for the other 3 themes. Basically, all escape rooms have a setup story about why you're "trapped" in the room (you aren't really, there is always an emergency way to get out if necessary) and you have to solve puzzles to find what you need in order to get out within the time limit (usually an hour).  The best part is that you have to discover what to do by just searching and guessing.  This room was just the right level of difficulty for my group of 5 adult newbies and myself (who had done a couple before) -- the staff watches what you're doing through a camera and will give you just the right amount of guidance and hints via a typed message on a monitor or by intercom if you seem stuck or going in the wrong direction.  We made it out in 58:47, just barely in time!  This was a "moderate to challenging" room so we are working up to the more difficult ones (you can gauge difficulty by the posted "success rate" of teams in the room -- the one we did, for example, has a 32% success rate).  The rooms accept up to 8 people, and I wouldn't recommend trying it with less than 4 because it's very helpful to have multiple people working on different puzzles at the same time.  If you have less than 8 there is also a  possibility you could be in the room with strangers to fill the extra spaces.  That can be a fun way to meet new people -- or it can also be a problem, especially if they are very experienced (and solve the puzzles before you get a chance) OR if they are frustrated because YOU are hogging all the glory (LOL).  Just keep this in mind!  It would also be great fun with more mature teens 12 and up, though it might help to have some adults in the room too.  It takes about 90 minutes start to finish (to learn the rules, practice locks, etc. beforehand and then take a triumphant/consolation group photo after) and you don't need to bring anything other than your brain.  GO!  You'll have a great time and will help keep this great new option for Cheyenne fun going for the rest of us!

owner_response.author: Jessika_and_Sarah, Owner at Epic Escape Game Cheyenne, responded to this review
owner_response.text: Thank you for taking the time to express your honest opinions. We're very excited to learn that we meet the expectations of our customers, especially those who are experienced players.
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Teambuilding with Co-Workers
data.text: This was an amazing way to see the dynamics of our team in action! I can't wait to have my arguing, teenagers locked into a room together! Maybe they really can work together????

owner_response.author: Jessika_and_Sarah, Owner at Epic Escape Game Cheyenne, responded to this review
owner_response.text: We're excited to hear that you enjoyed your team building experience! Thank you for your rating!
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Mother son date
data.text:
Staff/owners were super nice and down to earth. They gave clues at the right time. The room was the right amount of difficult. 

All in all a great hour spent and no complaints about the pricing, we all have to make a living! 

We are definately doing it again! We will conquer at least one room dang it.

owner_response.author: Jessika_and_Sarah, Owner at Epic Escape Game Cheyenne, responded to this review
owner_response.text: We're so happy that you guys enjoyed playing our room! Thank you for your rating and feedback! We can't wait to have you back again!
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Fun Team Building event
data.text: We have had to travel to Denver with our team to do these kind of events, and we are so excited that we have something in Cheyenne to do.  The game room defeated us, but we can't wait to go back.  We want to do the Zombie room!  I can't wait to take my family.

owner_response.author: Jessika_and_Sarah, Owner at Epic Escape Game Cheyenne, responded to this review
owner_response.text: Great to hear that you had a fun time! Thank you for your rating! Hope to see you back again!
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Great Fun for Entire Family
data.text: This is a fun and challenging activity for all ages.  Our family has visited three of the rooms and enjoyed all of them!  This was a new adventure for all of us, and we had a great time!  I strongly recommend you give it a try!

owner_response.author: Jessika_and_Sarah, Owner at Epic Escape Game Cheyenne, responded to this review
owner_response.text: Thank you for your review and support! Glad you had a great time!
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: So much fun!
data.text: Great fun!! A wonderful start to a night out with friends or family. We did the games room and cannot wait to go back for the zombie room.

owner_response.author: Jessika_and_Sarah, Owner at Epic Escape Game Cheyenne, responded to this review
owner_response.text: Glad you had a great time! Thank you for your support!
owner_response.title: Owner Response
